pipeline_formula: encode(match) = (distance_back, match_length, next_char) → code(s) = base[length(s)] + rank_within_same_length
combined_description: Replace repeated sequences with back-references; basis for DEFLATE; Huffman variant requiring only code lengths to reconstruct; used in DEFLATE

pipeline_formula: BWT(s) = last_column(sort(all_rotations(s))) → MTF(s_i) = index_of(s_i, L); then move s_i to L[0] → encode(n zeros) = (ZERO_TOKEN, count); non-zeros passed through → code_length(x) = ceil(-log2(p(x)))
combined_description: Reversible transform that groups similar contexts together; basis for bzip2; Exploits locality by outputting small numbers for recently-seen symbols; RLE specialized for runs of zeros; common after BWT+MTF; Optimal prefix-free code for known distributions; used in DEFLATE

pipeline_formula: delta_i = x_i - x_{i-1}; x_0' = x_0 → LZMA = LZ77_matches + range_coder(context_modeled_bits)
combined_description: Stores differences between consecutive values; effective for sorted/smooth data; LZ77 with range coding and sophisticated context modeling; used in 7z, xz
Modern LZ77 + ANS entropy coding; excellent ratio/speed tradeoff

pipeline_formula: P(x) = weighted_blend(P_order_n(x), P_order_n-1(x), ..., P_order_0(x)) → range = high - low; update [low, high) based on cumulative probability
combined_description: Blends predictions from multiple context orders with escape mechanism; Arithmetic coding variant with byte-aligned output; used in LZMA

pipeline_formula: P = sigmoid(SUM(w_i * ln(P_i / (1 - P_i)))) → [low, high) = [low + range*CDF(x-1), low + range*CDF(x))
combined_description: Logistic mixing in log-odds space; more stable than linear mixing; Near-optimal entropy coding; approaches H(X) bits per symbol
Extremely fast LZ77 variant optimized for decompression speed

pipeline_formula: x_hat_i = SUM(a_j * x_{i-j}) for j=1 to p → R_k(n) = unary(n >> k) + k lowest bits of n
combined_description: Linear combination of previous samples; used in FLAC, PNG; Golomb code with m = 2^k; simpler and faster

pipeline_formula: Paeth(left, above, upper_left) = closest_to(left + above - upper_left) → delta_i = x_i - x_{i-1}; x_0' = x_0 → encode(match) = (distance_back, match_length, next_char) → code(s) = base[length(s)] + rank_within_same_length
combined_description: 2D predictor selecting from left/above/diagonal based on gradient; Stores differences between consecutive values; effective for sorted/smooth data; Replace repeated sequences with back-references; basis for DEFLATE; Huffman variant requiring only code lengths to reconstruct; used in DEFLATE

pipeline_formula: P_s = 0.5 * P_estimated(s) + 0.5 * P_child0 * P_child1 → [low, high) = [low + range*CDF(x-1), low + range*CDF(x))
combined_description: Bayesian mixture over all context tree depths; theoretically optimal; Near-optimal entropy coding; approaches H(X) bits per symbol
